Description:
Our client is a Banking company. They are now looking for a Direct Sales Agent to join them. Roles & ResponsibilitiesDetermine customers' financial services needs and prepare proposals to sell services that address these needs.
Prepare forms or agreements to complete sales.
Contact prospective customers to present information and explain available services.
Develop prospects from current commercial customers, referral leads, or sales or partner meetings.Salary: AED 14500 - AED 15000Skills
Skills:
Proven track record.
Experience in selling multi products

Excellent command of both written and spoken English.
Bachelor Degree preferred.
Proficient in computer literacy
